titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for travel expenses of certain loggers.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S587)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an individual an itemized deduction of travel expenses in connection with the trade or business of logging, including the miles to and from the individual's home.
